1.name: Gladiator
1.synopsis: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
1.casts: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed

2.name: Memento
2.synopsis: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.
2.casts: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior

3.name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
3.synopsis: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.
3.casts: Yun-Fat Chow, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang, Chen Chang

4.name: Traffic
4.synopsis: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.
4.casts: Michael Douglas, Benicio Del Toro, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Jacob Vargas

5.name: Almost Famous
5.synopsis: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.
5.casts: Billy Crudup, Patrick Fugit, Kate Hudson, Frances McDormand

6.name: Requiem for a Dream
6.synopsis: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.
6.casts: Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans

7.name: Cast Away
7.synopsis: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.
7.casts: Tom Hanks, Helen Hunt, Paul Sanchez, Lari White

8.name: Snatch
8.synopsis: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
8.casts: Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro, Dennis Farina

9.name: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
9.synopsis: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.
9.casts: George Clooney, John Turturro, Tim Blake Nelson, John Goodman

10.name: X-Men
10.synopsis: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.
10.casts: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen

1.name: A Beautiful Mind
1.synopsis: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.
1.casts: Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly, Christopher Plummer

2.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
2.synopsis: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
2.casts: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean

3.name: Black Hawk Down
3.synopsis: 160 elite U.S. soldiers drop into Somalia to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord and find themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.
3.casts: Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore, Eric Bana

4.name: Amélie
4.synopsis: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.
4.casts: Audrey Tautou, Mathieu Kassovitz, Rufus, Lorella Cravotta

5.name: Shrek
5.synopsis: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.
5.casts: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, John Lithgow

6.name: Donnie Darko
6.synopsis: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.
6.casts: Jake Gyllenhaal, Jena Malone, Mary McDonnell, Holmes Osborne

7.name: Mulholland Drive
7.synopsis: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.
7.casts: Naomi Watts, Laura Harring, Justin Theroux, Jeanne Bates

8.name: Training Day
8.synopsis: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.
8.casts: Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn, Tom Berenger

9.name: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
9.synopsis: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.
9.casts: Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, Frances O'Connor, Sam Robards

10.name: Moulin Rouge!
10.synopsis: A poet falls for a beautiful courtesan whom a jealous duke covets.
10.casts: Nicole Kidman, Ewan McGregor, John Leguizamo, Jim Broadbent

1.name: The Pianist
1.synopsis: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
1.casts: Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay, Emilia Fox

2.name: Catch Me If You Can
2.synopsis: A seasoned FBI agent pursues Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully forged millions of dollars' worth of checks while posing as a Pan Am pilot, a doctor, and a legal prosecutor.
2.casts: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen

3.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
3.synopsis: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
3.casts: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom

4.name: Gangs of New York
4.synopsis: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.
4.casts: Leonardo DiCaprio, Cameron Diaz, Daniel Day-Lewis, Jim Broadbent

5.name: Hero
5.synopsis: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.
5.casts: Jet Li, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Maggie Cheung, Ziyi Zhang

6.name: Adaptation
6.synopsis: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.
6.casts: Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep, Chris Cooper, Tilda Swinton

7.name: The Bourne Identity
7.synopsis: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.
7.casts: Franka Potente, Matt Damon, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen

8.name: Spider-Man
8.synopsis: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.
8.casts: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco

9.name: Road to Perdition
9.synopsis: A mob enforcer's son witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.
9.casts: Tom Hanks, Tyler Hoechlin, Rob Maxey, Liam Aiken

10.name: Minority Report
10.synopsis: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.
10.casts: Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton, Max von Sydow

1.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
1.synopsis: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
1.casts: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom

2.name: Finding Nemo
2.synopsis: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
2.casts: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe

3.name: City of God
3.synopsis: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.
3.casts: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Matheus Nachtergaele, Phellipe Haagensen

4.name: Kill Bill: Vol I
4.synopsis: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.
4.casts: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah, Michael Madsen

5.name: Oldboy
5.synopsis: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.
5.casts: Min-sik Choi, Ji-Tae Yoo, Hye-jeong Kang, Dae-han Ji

6.name: Mystic River
6.synopsis: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.
6.casts: Sean Penn, Tim Robbins, Kevin Bacon, Emmy Rossum

7.name: Big Fish
7.synopsis: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.
7.casts: Ewan McGregor, Albert Finney, Billy Crudup, Jessica Lange

8.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
8.synopsis: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
8.casts: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley

9.name: X2: X-Men United
9.synopsis: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.
9.casts: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry, Ian McKellen

10.name: Lost in Translation
10.synopsis: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.
10.casts: Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson, Giovanni Ribisi, Anna Faris

1.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
1.synopsis: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.
1.casts: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson, Gerry Robert Byrne

2.name: Million Dollar Baby
2.synopsis: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
2.casts: Hilary Swank, Clint Eastwood, Morgan Freeman, Jay Baruchel

3.name: The Passion of the Christ
3.synopsis: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.
3.casts: Jim Caviezel, Monica Bellucci, Maia Morgenstern, Christo Jivkov

4.name: The Incredibles
4.synopsis: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.
4.casts: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee

5.name: The Aviator
5.synopsis: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.
5.casts: Leonardo DiCaprio, Cate Blanchett, Kate Beckinsale, John C. Reilly

6.name: Shrek 2
6.synopsis: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.
6.director: Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury, Conrad Vernon
6.casts: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Julie Andrews

7.name: Spider-Man 2
7.synopsis: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.
7.casts: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco

8.name: Shaun of the Dead
8.synopsis: A man's uneventful life is disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.
8.casts: Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis

9.name: The Notebook
9.synopsis: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.
9.casts: Gena Rowlands, James Garner, Rachel McAdams, Ryan Gosling

10.name: Sideways
10.synopsis: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment embark on a week-long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.
10.casts: Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, Virginia Madsen, Sandra Oh

1.name: Batman Begins
1.synopsis: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
1.casts: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe, Liam Neeson

2.name: Munich
2.synopsis: Based on the true story of the Black September aftermath, about the five men chosen to eliminate the ones responsible for that fateful day.
2.casts: Eric Bana, Daniel Craig, Marie-Josée Croze, Ciarán Hinds

3.name: Brokeback Mountain
3.synopsis: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years.
3.casts: Jake Gyllenhaal, Heath Ledger, Michelle Williams, Randy Quaid

4.name: A History of Violence
4.synopsis: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core in this action thriller.
4.casts: Viggo Mortensen, Maria Bello, Ed Harris, William Hurt

5.name: Good Night, and Good Luck
5.synopsis: Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow looks to bring down Senator Joseph McCarthy.
5.casts: David Strathairn, George Clooney, Patricia Clarkson, Jeff Daniels

6.name: Sin City
6.synopsis: A movie that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.
6.director: Frank Miller, Robert Rodriguez, Quentin Tarantino
6.casts: Mickey Rourke, Clive Owen, Bruce Willis, Jessica Alba

7.name: King Kong
7.synopsis: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.
7.casts: Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann

8.name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
8.synopsis: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.
8.casts: Robert Downey Jr., Val Kilmer, Michelle Monaghan, Corbin Bernsen

9.name: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
9.synopsis: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.
9.casts: Steve Carell, Catherine Keener, Paul Rudd, Romany Malco

10.name: Mr
10.synopsis: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.
10.casts: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Adam Brody, Vince Vaughn

1.name: The Departed
1.synopsis: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
1.casts: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg

2.name: Little Miss Sunshine
2.synopsis: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
2.casts: Steve Carell, Toni Collette, Greg Kinnear, Abigail Breslin

3.name: Blood Diamond
3.synopsis: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.
3.casts: Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou, Jennifer Connelly, Kagiso Kuypers

4.name: Letters from Iwo Jima
4.synopsis: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.
4.casts: Ken Watanabe, Kazunari Ninomiya, Tsuyoshi Ihara, Ryô Kase

5.name: Casino Royale
5.synopsis: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.
5.casts: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Judi Dench, Jeffrey Wright

6.name: Pan's Labyrinth
6.synopsis: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
6.casts: Ivana Baquero, Ariadna Gil, Sergi López, Maribel Verdú

7.name: The Prestige
7.synopsis: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.
7.casts: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson, Michael Caine

8.name: The Pursuit of Happyness
8.synopsis: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.
8.casts: Will Smith, Thandie Newton, Jaden Smith, Brian Howe

9.name: V for Vendetta
9.synopsis: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.
9.casts: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves, Stephen Rea

10.synopsis: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.
10.casts: Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, David Wenham, Dominic West

1.name: No Country for Old Men
1.synopsis: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
1.casts: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson

2.name: The Bourne Ultimatum
2.synopsis: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.
2.casts: Matt Damon, Edgar Ramírez, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles

3.name: There Will Be Blood
3.synopsis: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.
3.casts: Daniel Day-Lewis, Paul Dano, Ciarán Hinds, Martin Stringer

4.name: Ratatouille
4.synopsis: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.
4.casts: Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm

5.name: Atonement
5.synopsis: Fledgling writer Briony Tallis, as a thirteen-year-old, irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.
5.casts: Keira Knightley, James McAvoy, Brenda Blethyn, Saoirse Ronan

6.name: Juno
6.synopsis: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding her unborn child.
6.casts: Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner, Jason Bateman

7.name: American Gangster
7.synopsis: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.
7.casts: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Josh Brolin

8.name: Into the Wild
8.synopsis: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.
8.casts: Emile Hirsch, Vince Vaughn, Catherine Keener, Marcia Gay Harden

9.name: 3:10 to Yuma
9.synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.
9.casts: Russell Crowe, Christian Bale, Ben Foster, Logan Lerman

10.name: Michael Clayton
10.synopsis: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multibillion-dollar class action suit.
10.casts: George Clooney, Tilda Swinton, Tom Wilkinson, Michael O'Keefe

1.name: The Dark Knight
1.synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
1.casts: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine

2.name: Slumdog Millionaire
2.synopsis: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".
2.casts: Dev Patel, Freida Pinto, Saurabh Shukla, Anil Kapoor

3.name: WALL·E
3.synopsis: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
3.casts: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard

4.name: Taken
4.synopsis: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.
4.casts: Liam Neeson, Maggie Grace, Famke Janssen, Leland Orser

5.name: Iron Man
5.synopsis: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
5.casts: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges

6.name: Kung Fu Panda
6.synopsis: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance. However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a novice in martial arts.
6.casts: Jack Black, Ian McShane, Angelina Jolie, Dustin Hoffman

7.name: The Wrestler
7.synopsis: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.
7.casts: Mickey Rourke, Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood, Mark Margolis

8.name: Gran Torino
8.synopsis: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.
8.casts: Clint Eastwood, Bee Vang, Christopher Carley, Ahney Her

9.name: Frost/Nixon
9.synopsis: A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.
9.casts: Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Kevin Bacon, Sam Rockwell

10.name: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
10.synopsis: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.
10.casts: Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Tilda Swinton, Julia Ormond

1.name: Up
1.synopsis: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.
1.casts: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger, Christopher Plummer

2.name: The Hurt Locker
2.synopsis: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.
2.casts: Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie, Brian Geraghty, Guy Pearce

3.name: Avatar
3.synopsis: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
3.casts: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Michelle Rodriguez

4.name: Inglourious Basterds
4.synopsis: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.
4.casts: Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth, Mélanie Laurent

5.name: Star Trek
5.synopsis: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.
5.casts: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Simon Pegg, Leonard Nimoy

6.name: The Hangover
6.synopsis: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.
6.casts: Zach Galifianakis, Bradley Cooper, Justin Bartha, Ed Helms

7.name: District 9
7.synopsis: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.
7.casts: Sharlto Copley, David James, Jason Cope, Nathalie Boltt

8.name: Up in the Air
8.synopsis: Ryan Bingham enjoys living out of a suitcase for his job, travelling around the country firing people, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a potential love interest, and a new hire.
8.casts: George Clooney, Vera Farmiga, Anna Kendrick, Jason Bateman

9.name: 500 Days of Summer
9.synopsis: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.
9.casts: Zooey Deschanel, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Geoffrey Arend, Chloë Grace Moretz

10.name: Sherlock Holmes
10.synopsis: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.
10.casts: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong

1.name: Inception
1.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
1.casts: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Ken Watanabe

2.name: Toy Story 3
2.synopsis: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.
2.casts: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Ned Beatty

3.name: The Social Network
3.synopsis: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.
3.casts: Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield, Justin Timberlake, Rooney Mara

4.name: Black Swan
4.synopsis: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake".
4.casts: Natalie Portman, Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel, Winona Ryder

5.name: True Grit
5.synopsis: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.
5.casts: Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, Hailee Steinfeld, Josh Brolin

6.name: The King's Speech
6.synopsis: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.
6.casts: Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter, Derek Jacobi

7.name: Kick-Ass
7.synopsis: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.
7.casts: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Nicolas Cage, Chloë Grace Moretz, Garrett M. Brown

8.name: Shutter Island
8.synopsis: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.
8.casts: Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley

9.name: The Fighter
9.synopsis: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.
9.casts: Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Melissa Leo

10.name: 127 Hours
10.synopsis: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.
10.casts: James Franco, Amber Tamblyn, Kate Mara, Sean Bott
